protocol.name: P-G3704-1
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana ecotype Columbia glabra (gl1-1) was used in this study. Seeds were sterilized with diluted bleach (10 min incubation in 1.7% sodium hypochlorite, rinsing and washing thoroughly in sterile water), and incubated in 2.5 ml liquid growing medium [Murashige-Skoog (MS) half strength solution] in 6-well plates. Plates were incubated in the darkness at 4Â°C for 2 days and finally transferred to 23Â°C for 4 days before the sugar treatments. Two independent, replicated experiments were performed for sucrose treatments. Each independent experiment consisted of four replicated seedlings cultures, pooled after RNA extraction.

protocol.name: P-G3704-2
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana ecotype Columbia glabra were grown for 4 days in the dark at 23Â°C in multiwell plates containing half-strenght murashige skoog medium without added sucrose. Sample was subsequently kept for 6h under the same conditions with addition of 90 mM sucrose(shaking, thus aerobic).

protocol.name: P-G3704-3
protocol.text: RNA was processed for use on Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 GeneChip arrays (Affymetrix Inc., Santa Clara, CA, USA) as as described in the Affymetrix technical manual.

protocol.name: P-G3704-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from the seedlings samples using the Ambion RNAqueous extraction kit (Ambion, Austin, Texas, USA). RNA quality was assessed by agarose gel electrophoresis and spectrophotometry.
